attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcYAOGq98eXP7pHrpMn_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcYAPrYKHFdGOu-TZYJ_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcYAPrYKHFdGOu-TZYJ_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LclfHMeGHd7y6M627tC_itemcontent
attribs.current: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LclgEoDenrsQceAaOcn_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lcli32JmCI33tDoAoZ8_description
attribs.current: Your ranged weapon attacks with crossbows and firearms no longer suffer disadvantage due to long range. You gain an additional way to use your Sneak Attack; you don't need advantage on the attack roll to use your Sneak Attack against a creature if you move 0 feet during your turn, no enemies are within 5 feet of you, and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll. All the other rules for Sneak Attack still apply to you.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LclnmONqDV3akIgwK9e_description
attribs.current: You can use your bonus action to focus your attack, giving you advantage on your next attack. This feature can be used a number of times equal to your Dex modifier (min1). You recover your uses on a long rest
